subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Colorado Rockies have traded infielder Jamey Carroll to the Cleveland Indians for a player to be named, the teams said in statements. Carroll, 33, hit .225 with two home runs and 22 R.B.I. over 108 games last season.
